item.title: OpenAI聘请前Roblox高管担任首席人事官
item.description: OpenAI周二宣布任命阿文德·KC为首席人事官，这位前Roblox公司高管将负责招聘、员工入职培训及职业发展事务。随着ChatGPT开发商的持续扩张，该职位至关重要。【原文：OpenAI said Tuesday it has appointed Arvind KC as chief people officer, tapping the former Roblox Corp. executive to oversee hiring, orientation and employee development as the ChatGPT maker continues to expand.】

item.title: 德意志银行称，美国国债收益率主要受油价冲击影响
item.description: 若想了解十年期美国国债收益率的走势，请关注油价动向。【原文：If you want to know what’s going to happen to the 10-year Treasury note’s yield, watch the price of oil.】

item.title: 贸易融资商Raistone在First Brands爆雷后将进入清算程序
item.description: 雷斯通资本是一家贸易融资公司，因汽车零部件供应商第一品牌集团倒闭而遭受重创，在结束运营数周后于周一申请清算。【原文：Raistone Capital, a trade finance firm that was done in by the collapse of auto parts supplier First Brands Group, filed for liquidation on Monday, weeks after winding down its operations.】

item.title: 亚马逊实验室负责人、曾主导网络智能体项目的负责人即将离职
item.description: 亚马逊公司人工智能实验室负责人正离开公司，该负责人曾领导开发自主智能体的工作。【原文：The head of an Amazon.com Inc. artificial intelligence lab who led efforts to create autonomous agents is leaving the company.】

item.title: 软件制造商WiseTech将裁员30%以转型人工智能业务
item.description: WiseTech Global Ltd.计划通过人工智能驱动的重组裁减约2000个岗位——占员工总数的近30%——此举旨在实现人工智能带来的效率提升，而人工智能正颠覆着全球软件行业。【原文：WiseTech Global Ltd. plans to cut about 2,000 jobs — almost 30% of the workforce — under an AI-driven revamp, crystallizing efficiencies from artificial intelligence that are upending the global software industry.】

item.title: 亚洲股市有望跟随美国科技股引领的反弹：市场综述
item.description: 亚洲股市有望上涨，此前科技股的反弹提振了华尔街，缓解了人们对人工智能破坏性影响的部分担忧。【原文：Stocks in Asia looked set to climb after a rally in technology firms boosted Wall Street, easing some concerns about the disruptive impacts of artificial intelligence.】

item.title: 美国最高出口执法官员称英伟达未向中国售出一台H200芯片
item.description: 据一位协助执行出口管制的美方官员透露，在特朗普总统决定允许向世界第二大经济体出口人工智能处理器两个月后，英伟达公司尚未向中国售出任何H200芯片。【原文：Nvidia Corp. has yet to sell any of its H200 chips to China two months after President Donald Trump’s decision to allow shipments of the artificial intelligence processors to the world’s second-largest economy, according to a US official who helps enforce export controls.】

item.title: 汇丰股价自低点飙升89%后面临盈利考验
item.description: 汇丰控股周三公布的财报备受关注，市场焦点集中在其营收前景及子公司收购事宜上，该公司股价目前徘徊于历史高位附近。【原文：HSBC Holdings Plc’s earnings Wednesday come with revenue prospects and the buyout of a subsidiary in focus, as the shares hover around a record high.】

item.title: 刺激计划将释放8400亿美元现金，提振日本股市前景
item.description: 日本公司治理准则的最新修订可能释放部分上市公司持有的8400亿美元现金，并推动日本股市迎来新一轮买盘。【原文：A new revision to Japan’s corporate governance code may free up some of the $840 billion in cash held by listed companies and drive another wave of Japanese stock market buying.】

item.title: 债券交易员押注美联储降息将延续至2027年
item.description: 美国期货和期权市场的交易员们正纷纷押注美联储明年将继续降息而非加息。【原文：Traders in US futures and options markets are piling on bets that the Federal Reserve will continue cutting rates into next year instead of raising them.】

item.description: 詹姆斯·范·吉伦万万没想到，自己周一竟会引发股市崩盘。但事实正是如此。【原文：The last thing James van Geelen expected to do on Monday was trigger a stock market meltdown. But that’s what he did.】

item.title: 惠普预计年度利润将处于预期区间下限，因内存价格走低
item.description: 惠普公司给出了本季度的盈利预期，该预期可能低于市场预期。该公司表示，由于关税和内存芯片价格上涨的影响，全年盈利可能达到此前预测区间的下限。【原文：HP Inc. gave a profit outlook for the current quarter that may fall short of estimates and said full-year earnings will likely hit the lower end of a previously forecast range as the company copes with tariffs and the rising price of memory chips.】

item.title: 美联储柯林斯称利率可能维持不变"一段时间"
item.description: 波士顿联邦储备银行行长苏珊·柯林斯表示，鉴于近期经济数据显示劳动力市场有所改善，而通胀风险依然存在，利率很可能在"一段时间内"保持不变。【原文：Federal Reserve Bank of Boston President Susan Collins said interest rates are likely to stay unchanged “for some time” as recent economic data shows an improvement in the labor market, while risks to inflation remain.】

item.title: 参议员启动对币安的调查，涉指控其违反伊朗、俄罗斯制裁
item.description: 美国一名资深参议员针对加密货币交易所币安控股有限公司展开调查，此前有报道称该平台涉嫌向被列为恐怖组织的伊朗政府团体输送近20亿美元资金，并协助规避美国对俄罗斯石油的制裁。【原文：A senior US senator opened an inquiry into crypto exchange Binance Holdings Ltd. following news reports of its involvement in funneling nearly $2 billion to Iranian government groups designated as terrorist organizations and helping to evade US sanctions on Russian oil.】

item.title: 进口商在最高法院胜诉后启动关税退还程序
item.description: 一群成功在美国最高法院挑战唐纳德·特朗普总统全球关税政策的小企业，现已要求下级法院重启法律程序，以便他们能够启动向政府申请退税的流程。【原文：A group of small businesses that successfully challenged President Donald Trump’s global tariffs before the US Supreme Court have asked lower courts to reopen the legal proceedings so that they can begin the process of seeking refunds from the government.】

item.title: 韩国央行料维持利率不变，因通胀温和且经济增长稳定
item.description: 韩国央行本周料将维持基准利率不变，温和的通胀和稳定的芯片出口为当局提供了空间，使其能够密切关注房地产市场复苏带来的金融稳定风险。【原文：South Korea’s central bank is widely expected to keep its benchmark interest rate unchanged this week as tame inflation and steady chip exports give authorities room to monitor financial stability risks tied to a property market rally.】

item.title: 苹果触屏版MacBook Pro将配备动态岛及全新界面
item.description: 据知情人士透露，苹果公司备受期待的触屏笔记本电脑将为Mac界面带来重大变革，包括引入iPhone的动态岛功能。【原文：Apple Inc.’s long-awaited foray into touch-screen laptops will bring major changes to the Mac interface, including the addition of the iPhone’s Dynamic Island feature, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: CoreWeave寻求85亿美元银行贷款，该贷款由Meta交易提供支持
item.description: 据知情人士透露，CoreWeave公司正计划从摩根士丹利和三菱日联金融集团等银行筹集约85亿美元资金，用于帮助Meta Platforms公司扩建云计算能力。【原文：CoreWeave Inc. is looking to raise about $8.5 billion from banks including Morgan Stanley and Mitsubishi UFJ Financial Group Inc. to help finance a buildout of cloud computing capacity for Meta Platforms Inc., according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.description: 杠杆贷款交易员正大幅削减对软件债务的敞口——其中大部分在2026年初以面值或接近面值的价格发行——这表明市场正弥漫着对人工智能的担忧。【原文：Leveraged-loan traders are slashing their exposure to software debt — much of which entered 2026 priced at or near par — in a sign of how artificial-intelligence fears are rippling across the market.】

item.title: 五角大楼威胁终止人类学研究，因人工智能术语之争引发争端
item.description: 五角大楼警告Anthropic PBC公司，若这家人工智能初创企业未能满足政府对其技术使用的条款要求，将于周五终止与该公司的军事合同。知情人士透露。【原文：The Pentagon warned Anthropic PBC that it would terminate the company’s military contracts on Friday if the artificial intelligence startup failed to meet government terms for use of its technology, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: VoltaGrid乘势而上，正权衡公开上市或出售事宜
item.description: VoltaGrid是一家初创公司，为科技企业提供运行人工智能系统所需能源的捷径，目前正探索筹集数十亿美元资金以维持其增长。【原文：VoltaGrid, a startup that offers tech companies a shortcut to the energy needed to run artificial-intelligence systems, is exploring ways to raise billions of dollars to sustain its growth.】

item.title: 阿根廷中期选举后经济增速超预期
item.description: 阿根廷12月经济增长超预期，部分得益于创纪录的小麦丰收抵消了关键中期选举带来的负面影响。【原文：Argentina’s economy grew more than expected in December due in part to a historic wheat harvest that offset the fallout from a pivotal midterm election.】

item.title: 白宫经济学家称Citrini人工智能报告为"科幻小说"
item.description: 白宫一位顶级经济学家将周末关于人工智能风险的报告称为"科幻小说"，该报告曾引发股市剧烈波动。【原文：A top White House economist dubbed the weekend report about artificial intelligence risks that had roiled the stock market “science fiction.”】

item.title: German Government Waters Down Controversial Heating Law
item.description: 德国政府同意废除一项备受争议的禁令，该禁令曾禁止安装新的燃气和燃油供暖系统。此举源于总理弗里德里希·梅尔茨领导的保守派政党正全力兑现一项关键的竞选承诺。【原文：The German government agreed to abolish a controversial ban on new gas and oil heating systems as Chancellor Friedrich Merz’ conservatives rush to deliver on a key electoral promise.】

item.title: Telecom Italia Sets €400 Million Stock Buyback, Reverse Split
item.description: 意大利电信公司董事会提议实施最高4亿欧元（约合4.71亿美元）的股票回购计划，并推行1股拆10股的反向股票分割，旨在通过资产剥离后重整股权结构。【原文：Telecom Italia SpA’s board proposed an up to €400 million ($471 million) stock buyback and a 1-for-10 reverse stock split, moving to overhaul its equity profile after selling off assets.】

item.title: 人类因素助推汤森路透股价成为最新AI赢家
item.description: 焦躁不安的投资者正四处物色人工智能领域的获利机会，当汤森路透的法律工具获得人工智能巨头Anthropic PBC的赞誉后，投资者们便纷纷涌向该公司。【原文：Jittery investors scanning the horizon for winning artificial intelligence bets glommed on to Thomson Reuters Corp. after its legal tools earned kudos from AI juggernaut Anthropic PBC.】
